channel.title: Better Dev Screencasts
channel.description: A collection of resources to help developers create better screencasts, and level-up their overall video content creation game.
channel.copyright: All rights reserved, Better Dev Screencasts

item.title: Preparing Your Room For Audio Recordings
item.description: Good audio starts with ideal recording conditions. Let's explore some ways to optimise your room and drastically improve your audio takes!

item.title: The Best Video Transition Is Often... No Transition
item.description: When cutting from Scene A to Scene B, it's often tempting to use one of the built-in transitions provided by your video editing software, like a "cross-fade". Let's challenge that!
